content: a couple months ago i decided i wanted a dragon scale dice bag for my d&d game and went looking for a pattern to my dismay all the patterns i could find were all rather large scaled while i prefer small detail work instead so i took inspiration from an already existing pattern on ravalry and made any changes that were necessary to achieve my goal i highly recommend looking up this original pattern if you are looking to make a larger bag it s called xl dragonscale dice bag by jessica ryan this bag is made using a fingering weight yarn and a 2mm crochet hook the info up top also lists 2mm knitting needles among the requirements these are dpn s for knitting i-cord for the drawstring of the bag this is a technique i recommend for the drawstring but is not necessary a single_crochet foundation chain will work as well for this bag the crocodile stitch is used in the construction of the scales if you are unfamiliar with this technique you might want to look up a video just to get an idea of it
